main event: A reported UFO sighting in Denver, Colorado on 7 September 1956, where the object changed shape and had a very bright light.
interesting points: The object's shape changed from elliptical to round.,The object was observed both visually and through binoculars for 1 hour and 10 minutes.,The sighting lasted for 6 to 7 hours.,The object was concluded to probably be a balloon or possibly astronomical.,There were no photographs included with the report.
sighted object: one object changing shape with a very bright light
witness description: not specified, but identified as civilian source
